headline.print_headline: A Focus on the Effects of Dietary Supplements Among Troops in War Zones
headline.main: A Focus on the Effects of Dietary Supplements Among Troops in War Zones

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

docs.lead_paragraph: Experts say there is evidence that supplements used to increase muscle mass can have fatal effects, particularly those in desert climates like Afghanistan and Iraq.
docs.snippet: Experts say there is evidence that supplements used to increase muscle mass can have fatal effects, particularly those in desert climates like Afghanistan and Iraq.

headline.print_headline: Aging: Moderate Drinking May Help the Brain
headline.seo: Moderate Drinking Over 60 May Lower  Dementia Risk
headline.main: Aging: Moderate Drinking May Help the Brain

docs.lead_paragraph: People over 60 who consume moderate amounts of alcohol have a reduced risk for Alzheimer’s disease and other dementias, according to a large review of studies.
docs.snippet: People over 60 who consume moderate amounts of alcohol have a reduced risk for Alzheimer’s disease and other dementias, according to a large review of studies.
